title: [$250] Default admins to "To-do: Approve" rather than "To-do: Submit" in the reports tab

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: NewFeature
labels.description: Something to build that is a new item.

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

body:
Problem: We default to the "Submit" filter from the to-do list, which isn't a helpful action for most admins to take. Many admins may not even submit expenses themselves, or at least it's not the action they'll take most commonly from their Expensify accounts. Solution: Defaulting admins to "Approve" should be more of a useful action, at least for the majority cases. [Context and discussion here.](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C03U7DCU4/p1758201002282589)

title: Add coloured labels to report statuses in New Expensify

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: NewFeature
labels.description: Something to build that is a new item.

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

body:
Problem: The status of a NewDot report can sometimes be lost in the header. Solution: Add coloured labels to signify the status, as we have in OldDot. [Discussion here.](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C03U7DCU4/p1758201002282589) [Figma file linked here](figma.com/design/CdzKNKciUJfPoJPvvQ7KFL/Search-Filter-Updates?node-id=438-82144&t=mjudCVBOML35dHZj-11)

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.20-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/71319 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** jsdiojsnoidjsodsi@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Account has self DM and no workspace. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Create two workspaces. 3. Delete the workspace that has Default label. 4. Go to workspace chat. 5. Create an empty report. 6. Go to self DM. 7. Track a manual expense. 8. Open the transaction thread. 9. Click Report. ## Expected Result: Report field will open report list because there is an open report. ## Actual Result: Report field opens Upgrade page when there is an open report. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/07e5d766-3df3-4227-9c63-4fe3638d3162 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.20-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/71474 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** sdoijsdnoisjniojs@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: 1. Go to staging.expensify.com 2. Create an unreported distance expense (Report field is none) with the following waypoints: Start - 88 kearny street Stop - Golden gate bridge 3. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 4. Go to self DM. 5. Go to transaction thread of the expense created in Step 2. 6. Go back to self DM. ## Expected Result: There will be no extra expense preview after creating unreported distance expense from OD. ## Actual Result: There is an extra expense preview which loads infinitely after creating unreported distance expense from OD. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e16103db-fe98-4619-be16-8ad1cdfcd8da [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

Disable **Workflows** in the workspace. 2. Create a new **Report**. 3. Notice the "next steps" message displayed, and then disappearing after a short while. 4. Create a new **Expense** within the report. 5. Again, a "next steps" message appears and then disappears after a short while. ## Expected Result: Next steps disabled without any issue ## Actual Result: "Next steps" messages appear and disappear when Workflows are disabled ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop

title: [$250] Web - Instances are not copiable using the right click

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.19-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** Edge Cases - Issue to retest https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/58234 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** **App Component:** ## Action Performed: 1. Login to any account 2. Go to Account and select any Workspace -> Members and select a member, Right click on the email field 3. Select Profile and Right click on the email field 4. Go to any Workspace not owned by the user, Right click on the address field 5. Go to any paid report, with a merchant provided, Right click on the merchant field 6. Go to any paid distance expense, Right click on the distance, rate and date fields 7. Go to settings -> Wallet, open the card under Assigned cards, reveal the details and Right click on the card number field ## Expected Result: All these instances are copiable using the right click pattern. ## Actual Result: Instances are not copiable using the right click ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e104f538-4566-4e23-a47b-87bf127dd568 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
